name: New Year New Beat
description:
Play Code Junkie Studios' latest game: New Year, New Beat! It's a rhythm game based around the theme of fireworks with 5 cute chiptune tracks. Prove your worth by jumping into the new year with your toes tapping and your fingers clacking!

See downloads for standalone game or see link to play in browser, use firefox for best experience.

https://yahtzeerage.github.io/New-Year-New-Beat-/

Contributors: Alex, Janrey, Morgan, Raymond, Yahiya
